bas_module.description: Billing-As-Service (BAS) allows applications to initiate billing operations independent of MO/MT message flow.

requirements.REQ-BAS-1: Supports direct debit transactions initiated by applications
requirements.REQ-BAS-2: Supports prepaid credit reservation, commit, and cancel flows
requirements.REQ-BAS-3: Supports topup transactions via Amount or Scratch Card
requirements.REQ-BAS-5: Integrates with Rating Module for charging validation
requirements.REQ-BAS-6: Generates CDRs for all BAS transactions
requirements.REQ-BAS-7: Provides error codes and descriptions for BAS failures
